title: Our Patron - St. Francis de Sales
biography: St. Francis de Sales (1567â€“1622) was a Bishop of Geneva and is honored as a saint in the Catholic Church. Known for his deep faith and gentle approach, he played a significant role in the Counter-Reformation. legacy: St. Francis de Sales is remembered for his teachings on the importance of love and humility. His philosophy emphasizes that holiness is attainable in everyday life, inspiring the mission and values of institutions like ours.
